Articles.Content: Do they just appear? can sentinels find them? i haven't been able to find a comet EVER! how can i get one????

They "just appear", not sure if sentinels find them too. They are a lot rarer than regular asteroid, so it may take a while. 

Maybe there is a config somewhere to make them appear more often but I'm not aware.

I'm assuming you've fully upgraded your tracking station? Do you also need to have the infrared telescope thing used for asteroids up in planetary orbit? Not sure myself as I haven't got as far as that in my current save game

If you see any unknown object with a scale of H, F, or higher and it's not that near at Kerbin, chances are that it's a comet.

I had discovered more than 10 already so far.
